mapper.insert: insert into song (song_ID, song_name, singer_ID, album_ID, song_directory, song_cover, examine) value (#{song_ID}, #{song_Name}, #{singer_ID}, #{album_ID}, #{song_Directory}, #{song_Cover}, 0)
mapper.select: select song_ID, song_name, song.singer_ID, singer_name, song.album_ID, album_name, song_directory, song_cover from song, album, singer where song.album_ID = #{album_ID} and album.album_ID = #{album_ID} and song.singer_ID = singer.singer_ID and examine = 1

select song_ID, song_name, song.singer_ID, singer_name, song.album_ID, album.album_name as album_name, song_directory, song_cover from song, album, singer where song.singer_ID = #{singer_ID} and singer.singer_ID = #{singer_ID} and song.album_ID = album.album_ID and examine = 1

select song_ID, song_name, singer.singer_name, song.singer_ID, album.album_name, song.album_ID, song_cover, song_directory from song, singer, album where song.song_ID in (select userlike.song_ID from userLike where user_ID = #{user_ID} and song_ID is not null) and singer.singer_ID = song.singer_ID and album.album_ID = song.album_ID and song.examine = 1 limit #{begin},#{size}

select song.song_name, singer.singer_name, album.album_name from song join singer join album where song.song_name like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') or singer.singer_name like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') or album.album_name like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
select userlike.song_ID from userlike where userlike.user_ID = #{user_ID} and userlike.song_ID is not null
select count(*) from song where song_ID in (select userLike.song_ID from userLike where user_ID = #{user_ID} and song_ID is not null)
